content: PHASE 0: UI Improvements - Enhance all service pages, better CTAs, improved imagery
PHASE 1: Backend Setup - Create MongoDB models for analytics, bookings, leads, campaigns
PHASE 1: Analytics Foundation - Track visitor data, page views, conversions with mock data
PHASE 2: Admin Command Center - Build dashboard UI with KPIs, charts, revenue tracking
PHASE 2: Connect Command Center to analytics data and display live metrics
PHASE 3: Lead Capture - Create popup system, booking funnels, conversion tracking
PHASE 3: Lead Management - Admin interface to view and manage captured leads
PHASE 4: AI Integration - Set up Emergent LLM for OpenAI GPT-4 and Claude
PHASE 4: AI Recommendations Engine - Auto-generate marketing insights and actions
PHASE 4: AI Content Generator - Auto-create blog posts, social media content, email campaigns
Test entire system end-to-end with screenshots and fix any issues
